alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 2:54AM MST until January 03 at 12:00AM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches in most areas. * WHERE...The Northern Black Hills, the Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills and the Southern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...Until midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the 5 1 1 app for your state.

area.areaDesc: Northern Black Hills; Southern Meade Co Plains; Sturgis, Piedmont Foot Hills
